CatDescriptText: Sign on wall in background reads:  "We belive that you want us to continue using the same high grade products. The best available prices have steadily climbed.  Therefore on March 13, prices for shampoo, press, & curl $4.00, this includes scalp oil, creme rinse, & edge up"
TitMainTitle: Seven women examining objects in beauty salon with March 1962 calendar and handwritten sign on back wall, at 1111 Lang Avenue, Homewood
